name: places/ChIJ0dLHf4xYwokRcI-rd3TERZw
formattedAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Carolyn Hiltebeitel is simply amazing!
She is the doctor that everyone hopes to get for their children once you become a parent. We have been with her since we became first time parents in 2014 and were filled with questions. She is always professional and is just really knowledgeable. Always so helpful with any questions or concerns we may have. Fast forward to 2020 we had our second baby and she is also his primary doctor. We are so BLESSED to have her.
Eva & Elliot Lopez

originalText.text: We love Dr. Hiltebeitel. She is caring, shows concern, is informative, and is just what my toddlers need. Thank you for being the best!

text.text: We love Dr. Hiltebeitel. She is caring, shows concern, is informative, and is just what my toddlers need. Thank you for being the best!

originalText.text: A pleasure like always . She saw both twins even though there was an apt for one only. Dr Hiltebeitel has been a pleasure for our twins for 3 years + now.

text.text: A pleasure like always . She saw both twins even though there was an apt for one only. Dr Hiltebeitel has been a pleasure for our twins for 3 years + now.

originalText.text: Dr. Hiltebeitel always answers my questions thoroughly. She makes me feel comfortable enough to ask her any questions or express any  concerns that I may have about my son. She is truly kind and respectful which is important because as a parent you want to feel supported by your pediatrician.

text.text: Dr. Hiltebeitel always answers my questions thoroughly. She makes me feel comfortable enough to ask her any questions or express any  concerns that I may have about my son. She is truly kind and respectful which is important because as a parent you want to feel supported by your pediatrician.

originalText.text: We love Dr. Hiltebeital!!  She’s kind, patient, and so knowledgeable.  I feel really comfortable talking to her and she’s not an alarmist.  She has a wonderful way with children especially my 18 month old who had a meltdown at our last visit.  Highly recommend
